018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.bucket;
019
020import java.io.FileOutputStream;
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.util.Comparator;
023import java.util.HashMap;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.NavigableSet;
026import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
027import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentSkipListSet;
028import java.util.function.Function;
029import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.ByteBuffAllocator;
030import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.ByteBuffAllocator.Recycler;
031import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.BlockCacheKey;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.BlockPriority;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.BlockType;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.CacheableDeserializerIdManager;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.HFileBlock;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Pair;
038import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
039
040import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.ByteString;
041
042import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.BucketCacheProtos;
043
044@InterfaceAudience.Private
045final class BucketProtoUtils {
046
047  final static byte[] PB_MAGIC_V2 = new byte[] { 'V', '2', 'U', 'F' };
048
049  private BucketProtoUtils() {
050
051  }
052
053  static BucketCacheProtos.BucketCacheEntry toPB(BucketCache cache,
054    BucketCacheProtos.BackingMap backingMap) {
055    return BucketCacheProtos.BucketCacheEntry.newBuilder().setCacheCapacity(cache.getMaxSize())
056      .setIoClass(cache.ioEngine.getClass().getName())
057      .setMapClass(cache.backingMap.getClass().getName())
058      .putAllDeserializers(CacheableDeserializerIdManager.save())
059      .putAllCachedFiles(toCachedPB(cache.fullyCachedFiles)).setBackingMap(backingMap)
060      .setChecksum(ByteString
061        .copyFrom(((PersistentIOEngine) cache.ioEngine).calculateChecksum(cache.getAlgorithm())))
062      .build();
063  }
064
065  public static void serializeAsPB(BucketCache cache, FileOutputStream fos, long chunkSize,
066    long numChunks) throws IOException {
067    int blockCount = 0;
068    int chunkCount = 0;
069    int backingMapSize = cache.backingMap.size();
070    BucketCacheProtos.BackingMap.Builder builder = BucketCacheProtos.BackingMap.newBuilder();
071
072    fos.write(PB_MAGIC_V2);
073    fos.write(Bytes.toBytes(chunkSize));
074    fos.write(Bytes.toBytes(numChunks));
075
076    BucketCacheProtos.BackingMapEntry.Builder entryBuilder =
077      BucketCacheProtos.BackingMapEntry.newBuilder();
078    for (Map.Entry<BlockCacheKey, BucketEntry> entry : cache.backingMap.entrySet()) {
079      blockCount++;
080      entryBuilder.clear();
081      entryBuilder.setKey(BucketProtoUtils.toPB(entry.getKey()));
082      entryBuilder.setValue(BucketProtoUtils.toPB(entry.getValue()));
083      builder.addEntry(entryBuilder.build());
084
085      if (blockCount % chunkSize == 0 || (blockCount == backingMapSize)) {
086        chunkCount++;
087        if (chunkCount == 1) {
088          // Persist all details along with the first chunk into BucketCacheEntry
089          BucketProtoUtils.toPB(cache, builder.build()).writeDelimitedTo(fos);
090        } else {
091          // Directly persist subsequent backing-map chunks.
092          builder.build().writeDelimitedTo(fos);
093        }
094        if (blockCount < backingMapSize) {
095          builder.clear();
096        }
097      }
098    }
099  }
100
101  private static BucketCacheProtos.BlockCacheKey toPB(BlockCacheKey key) {
102    return BucketCacheProtos.BlockCacheKey.newBuilder().setHfilename(key.getHfileName())
103      .setOffset(key.getOffset()).setPrimaryReplicaBlock(key.isPrimary())
104      .setBlockType(toPB(key.getBlockType())).build();
105  }
106
107  private static BucketCacheProtos.BlockType toPB(BlockType blockType) {
108    switch (blockType) {
109      case DATA:
110        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.data;
111      case META:
112        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.meta;
113      case TRAILER:
114        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.trailer;
115      case INDEX_V1:
116        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.index_v1;
117      case FILE_INFO:
118        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.file_info;
119      case LEAF_INDEX:
120        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.leaf_index;
121      case ROOT_INDEX:
122        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.root_index;
123      case BLOOM_CHUNK:
124        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.bloom_chunk;
125      case ENCODED_DATA:
126        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.encoded_data;
127      case GENERAL_BLOOM_META:
128        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.general_bloom_meta;
129      case INTERMEDIATE_INDEX:
130        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.intermediate_index;
131      case DELETE_FAMILY_BLOOM_META:
132        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.delete_family_bloom_meta;
133      default:
134        throw new Error("Unrecognized BlockType.");
135    }
136  }
137
138  private static BucketCacheProtos.BucketEntry toPB(BucketEntry entry) {
139    return BucketCacheProtos.BucketEntry.newBuilder().setOffset(entry.offset())
140      .setCachedTime(entry.getCachedTime()).setLength(entry.getLength())
141      .setDiskSizeWithHeader(entry.getOnDiskSizeWithHeader())
142      .setDeserialiserIndex(entry.deserializerIndex).setAccessCounter(entry.getAccessCounter())
143      .setPriority(toPB(entry.getPriority())).build();
144  }
145
146  private static BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority toPB(BlockPriority p) {
147    switch (p) {
148      case MULTI:
149        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority.multi;
150      case MEMORY:
151        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority.memory;
152      case SINGLE:
153        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority.single;
154      default:
155        throw new Error("Unrecognized BlockPriority.");
156    }
157  }
158
159  static Pair<ConcurrentHashMap<BlockCacheKey, BucketEntry>, NavigableSet<BlockCacheKey>> fromPB(
160    Map<Integer, String> deserializers, BucketCacheProtos.BackingMap backingMap,
161    Function<BucketEntry, Recycler> createRecycler) throws IOException {
162    ConcurrentHashMap<BlockCacheKey, BucketEntry> result = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
163    NavigableSet<BlockCacheKey> resultSet = new ConcurrentSkipListSet<>(Comparator
164      .comparing(BlockCacheKey::getHfileName).thenComparingLong(BlockCacheKey::getOffset));
165    for (BucketCacheProtos.BackingMapEntry entry : backingMap.getEntryList()) {
166      BucketCacheProtos.BlockCacheKey protoKey = entry.getKey();
167      BlockCacheKey key = new BlockCacheKey(protoKey.getHfilename(), protoKey.getOffset(),
168        protoKey.getPrimaryReplicaBlock(), fromPb(protoKey.getBlockType()));
169      BucketCacheProtos.BucketEntry protoValue = entry.getValue();
170      // TODO:We use ByteBuffAllocator.HEAP here, because we could not get the ByteBuffAllocator
171      // which created by RpcServer elegantly.
172      BucketEntry value = new BucketEntry(protoValue.getOffset(), protoValue.getLength(),
173        protoValue.getDiskSizeWithHeader(), protoValue.getAccessCounter(),
174        protoValue.getCachedTime(),
175        protoValue.getPriority() == BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority.memory, createRecycler,
176        ByteBuffAllocator.HEAP);
177      // This is the deserializer that we stored
178      int oldIndex = protoValue.getDeserialiserIndex();
179      String deserializerClass = deserializers.get(oldIndex);
180      if (deserializerClass == null) {
181        throw new IOException("Found deserializer index without matching entry.");
182      }
183      // Convert it to the identifier for the deserializer that we have in this runtime
184      if (deserializerClass.equals(HFileBlock.BlockDeserializer.class.getName())) {
185        int actualIndex = HFileBlock.BLOCK_DESERIALIZER.getDeserializerIdentifier();
186        value.deserializerIndex = (byte) actualIndex;
187      } else {
188        // We could make this more plugable, but right now HFileBlock is the only implementation
189        // of Cacheable outside of tests, so this might not ever matter.
190        throw new IOException("Unknown deserializer class found: " + deserializerClass);
191      }
192      result.put(key, value);
193      resultSet.add(key);
194    }
195    return new Pair<>(result, resultSet);
196  }
197
198  private static BlockType fromPb(BucketCacheProtos.BlockType blockType) {
199    switch (blockType) {
200      case data:
201        return BlockType.DATA;
202      case meta:
203        return BlockType.META;
204      case trailer:
205        return BlockType.TRAILER;
206      case index_v1:
207        return BlockType.INDEX_V1;
208      case file_info:
209        return BlockType.FILE_INFO;
210      case leaf_index:
211        return BlockType.LEAF_INDEX;
212      case root_index:
213        return BlockType.ROOT_INDEX;
214      case bloom_chunk:
215        return BlockType.BLOOM_CHUNK;
216      case encoded_data:
217        return BlockType.ENCODED_DATA;
218      case general_bloom_meta:
219        return BlockType.GENERAL_BLOOM_META;
220      case intermediate_index:
221        return BlockType.INTERMEDIATE_INDEX;
222      case delete_family_bloom_meta:
223        return BlockType.DELETE_FAMILY_BLOOM_META;
224      default:
225        throw new Error("Unrecognized BlockType.");
226    }
227  }
228
229  static Map<String, BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap>
230    toCachedPB(Map<String, Pair<String, Long>> prefetchedHfileNames) {
231    Map<String, BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap> tmpMap = new HashMap<>();
232    prefetchedHfileNames.forEach((hfileName, regionPrefetchMap) -> {
233      BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap tmpRegionFileSize =
234        BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap.newBuilder().setRegionName(regionPrefetchMap.getFirst())
235          .setRegionCachedSize(regionPrefetchMap.getSecond()).build();
236      tmpMap.put(hfileName, tmpRegionFileSize);
237    });
238    return tmpMap;
239  }
240
241  static Map<String, Pair<String, Long>>
242    fromPB(Map<String, BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap> prefetchHFileNames) {
243    Map<String, Pair<String, Long>> hfileMap = new HashMap<>();
244    prefetchHFileNames.forEach((hfileName, regionPrefetchMap) -> {
245      hfileMap.put(hfileName,
246        new Pair<>(regionPrefetchMap.getRegionName(), regionPrefetchMap.getRegionCachedSize()));
247    });
248    return hfileMap;
249  }
250}
